entries.english: Pattern: Subject prefix + -ra- progressive marker + verb stem. Singular (a-): Nĩ aroka (is coming), Nĩ ararĩra (is crying), Nĩ ararĩa (is eating), Nĩ araria (is speaking), Nĩ arakena (is happy), Nĩ aratheka (is laughing), Nĩ arathĩĩ (is going), Nĩ arathooma (is reading), Nĩ arandĩka (is writing). Plural (ma-): Nĩ maroka (are coming), Nĩ mararĩra (are crying), Nĩ mararĩa (are eating), Nĩ mararia (are speaking), Nĩ marakena (are happy), Nĩ maratheka (are laughing), Nĩ marathĩĩ (are going), Nĩ marathooma (are reading), Nĩ marandĩka (are writing)

1st Person Singular (ndĩ-): Nĩĩ ndĩroka/ndĩrarĩra/ndĩrarĩa/ndĩraria/ndĩrakena/ndĩratheka/ndĩrathĩĩ/ndĩrathooma/ndĩrandĩka (I am coming/crying/eating/speaking/happy/laughing/going/reading/writing). 1st Person Plural (tũ-): Nĩĩ tũroka/tũrarĩra/tũrarĩa/tũraria/tũrakena/tũratheka/tũrathĩĩ/tũrathooma/tũrandĩka (we are...). 2nd Person Singular (ũ-): Nĩĩ ũroka/ũrarĩra/ũrarĩa/ũraria/ũrakena/ũratheka/ũrathĩĩ/ũrathooma/ũrandĩka (you are...). 2nd Person Plural (mũ-): Nĩĩ mũroka/mũrarĩra/mũrarĩa/mũraria/mũrakena/mũratheka/mũrathĩĩ/mũrathooma/mũrandĩka (you all are...)
